name: Flush It!
description:
Which flush will cause the gush?
Share some hilarious and suspense-filled moments with the Flush It! Game as players are being flushed.
Flushing, and evading hazards!
Who knows which flush will be the one that can't find the way out of the sewers, eliminating himself?

Get family and friends together to make some hilarious memories when you play the Toilet Trouble Game.

Flush It! Game, for Kids and Families, Ages 3 and up: 

Hilarious game for kids and families
Flush but watch out for random hazards in the sewers.
Funny toilet flushing sound effects
100% free without any hidden costs
Ages 3 and up
For 2 to 4 players

Flush It! is still under development and being made for the Kinda Funny Game Jam hosted by Manticore Games & KindaFunnyGames.

Expect a full feature rich experience as soon as the game jam is over.
